Package gui

Provides the classes necessary to manages the graphical user interface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    The purpose of this class is to show a dialog with information about the application
    AddDados
    Class that creates a frame to add data manually, an instance of this class is created on the class AppConfig.
    AddList
    Class that creates a frame to show listings and statistics, an instance of this class is created on the class AppConfig.
    AppConfig
    Class that creates a frame with some tabs to let the user choose if he wants to import, export, manually add, manually edit or either get listings and statistics.
    Botao
    A custom Button that extends JButton and loads an image to the button
    Chart
    Class that creates a line chart
    Drag
    Creates a drag and drop window
    Imagens
    Agregates all the images path used in this application
    JanelaPrincipal
    Main GUI window, it is loaded after the splash screen and loads the main menu.
    Main
    Main class of the program.
    Painel
    Custom panel with a background image
    SplashScreen
    Class that loads first, this class creates a simple splashscreen

Package gui Description

Provides the classes necessary to manages the graphical user interface.
